event_summary: Celtic music festival celebrating traditional Irish music, dance, and storytelling with musicians from Celtic nations.
commentary_summary: Music critics praised the authentic performances and successful intergenerational transmission of Celtic musical traditions.
next_event_plan: Create traditional music apprenticeship program and develop Celtic music digital archive
event_highlight: Collaboration between 80-year-old fiddle master and young contemporary folk band created viral performance
event_theme: Celtic Cultural Heritage and Traditional Music
event_object: To preserve and celebrate Celtic musical traditions while encouraging innovation and youth participation
event_conclusion: Featured 150 musicians, taught 1,000 students traditional instruments, and recorded live album reaching #1 on folk charts
event_conclusion_overall: Joyful celebration that honored Celtic heritage while proving traditional music's enduring vitality and appeal
next_event_suggestion: Include Celtic language learning sessions and create year-round traditional music sessions in pubs
